attributes.action: Give schools working days from 7:30 to 1:30
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In winter daylight is short and if a school finishes at 3:15 there is no time for the pupils to go out and relax with peers. In the summer it sometimes get really hot and pupils get restless and can't consentrate from 3 o'clock onwards. Signing this petition will give school pupils a more comfertable day in school.
